abstracts.cdata!:
These guidelines for resettlement, and
            land and asset acquisition issues, provide the principles to
            compensate project affected persons (PAPs), ensuring that
            all PAPs adversely affected by the implementation of the
            project - regardless of their land tenure status - will be
            assisted, in order to improve, or at least restore their
            living standards, income, and production capacity, to
            pre-project levels. Such principles stipulate that: a) land
            losses will be compensated at replacement costs, with an
            equally productive plot, or equivalent productive assets; b)
            materials, and assistance will be provided to fully replace
            solid structures that shall be demolished; c) crop losses
            will be replaced at market values; and, d) in-kind
            compensation shall also be provided as needed. A
            consultation process will be conducted to inform people
            about their rights to compensation, and, grievance
            mechanisms will be in place should any conflict occur.
